data.title: State Road Elementary School - Webster
data.meta_description: State Road Elementary School is a public school in Webster, New York that is part of Webster Central School District. It serves 455 studentsin Pre-K - 5 with a student/teacher ratio of 12.6:1.Its teachers have had 2 projects funded on DonorsChoose.
data.text:
About this school

State Road Elementary School is a suburban public school in Webster, New York that is part of Webster Central School District. It serves 455 students in Pre-K - 5 with a student/teacher ratio of 12.6:1. Its teachers have had 2 projects funded on DonorsChoose.

Grades Served

Pre-K - 5

Students

455

Teachers

36

State Road Elementary School Contact info is sourced from our partners at MDR Education, and DonorsChoose updates our site ahead of each school year.

(585) 872-4200

1401 State Rd

Webster, NY 14580

Website

DonorsChoose is the most trusted classroom funding site for teachers.

As a teacher-founded nonprofit, we're trusted by thousands of teachers and supporters across the country. Each classroom request for funding was created by a classroom teacher and reviewed by the DonorsChoose team.

See how DonorsChoose works

State Road Elementary School Support on DonorsChoose Last updated Aug 28, 2024

DonorsChoose makes it easy for anyone to help a teacher in need, moving us closer to a nation where students in every community have the tools and experiences they need for a great education.
